detectors.description:
OTBCToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#90-95) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#92)
detectors.markdown:
[OTBCToken.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#L90-L95) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#L92)

detectors.description:
OTBCToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#97-103) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#98)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#100)

detectors.description:
OTBCToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#71-73) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#72)

detectors.description: Variable OTBCToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#54) is not in mixedCase

OTBCToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#59-68) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#64)
detectors.markdown:
[OTBCToken.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#L59-L68) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#L64)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- OTBCToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#71-73)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#4-7)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- OTBCToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#75-77)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#9-12)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- OTBCToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#79-81)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#14-18)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- OTBCToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#90-95)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#20-21)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#23-24)
	- OTBCToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#83-88)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#43)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol#43-45)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/OTBCToken.sol)#83
